coverage.indigentCoverage: 26 million poor Filipinos (up from 1 million in 2001)

premiumCollections.context: Slight decline attributed to discounts and payment incentives after major calamities

private.context: Result of massive employer mapping nationwide

benefitEnhancements.name: General Benefit Ceiling
benefitEnhancements.detail: 35% aggregate increase without premium rate increase

benefitEnhancements.name: Pandemic Coverage
benefitEnhancements.detail: Up to P150,000 per case for Novel A (H1N1)

benefitEnhancements.name: Outpatient Care
benefitEnhancements.detail: Coverage of take-home medication for Sponsored Members under DOH P100 Program

innovations.name: Remittance-By-Air (RBA)
innovations.detail: Payment via text messaging (SMS) for Individually Paying Members

innovations.name: Overseas Mobile Office
innovations.detail: First overseas mobile office in Hong Kong and Macau
innovations.partners: DBP and LBP for OFW premium collections

keyPersonnel.chairman: Hon. Francisco T. Duque III, M.D., MSc. (2005-2009)
